subject: Re: Where to write  the  test
msgSnippet: If you mean where to put the junit tests: we put our java code under src/java and our unit tests under src/test but always in the same package. There are quite
messageBody:
If you mean where to put the junit tests:

we put our java code under src/java and our unit tests under src/test
but always in the same package.

There are quite a few excellent books on Junit on the bookstore shelfs
and it will help tremendously reading at least one of them.

Andreas


--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "gadesudhirreddy" <gadesudhirreddy@y...>
wrote:
>
>
> Hello friends,
>
> Iam new to unit testing,
> where to write the unit testing code.
> please help me
> Regards
> sudhir
